iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Ukraine
iati-activity.description: Protection of orphan children rights and rights of disabled orphan children who reside at the boarding schools of Luhansk region as well as to test forms and methods of work with orphan children on the issues of formation and planning of the family. Creating of organizational and activities model of functioning dealing with rendering legal assistance to orphan children and creation of media space concerning innovative forms of guardianship.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Ukraine
iati-activity.description: Project stimulates community-driven energy efficient projects helping municipal governments form innovative partnerships with residents and private companies to introduce and adopt energy-efficient technologies in its social service infrastructure.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Ukraine
iati-activity.description: 1.Clear Energy Centre development, 2.Eco Cluster Initiative study, study of Finnish experience in ecotech clusters: creation, operation and development 3.Social Survey of alternative energy technologies needs & business demand for renewables, 4.Number of energy conservation promotion events, 5.In order to reach wider audience the Project will strengthen cooperation with mass media.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Ukraine
iati-activity.description: Open Space "Rights of Working Women in Lviv region" - 2 days; Round tables meeting "Rights of Working Women in Lviv region"; Survey on interconnections between existence of children and employment of mother and father; Working group meetings; Conducting gender audit of 2 Lviv enterprises. Audit will be conducted by project experts; Training for employers, trade unions, Employment Centres, Labour Inspection on implementation gender-sensitive practices and policies at work places; Legal counselling and support for victims of discrimination in the labour market; Contests "Gender sensitive enterprise" and âGender sensitive employe

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Ukraine
iati-activity.description: Projects helps to inform the Ukrainian society about a number of important policy relevant issues, will help to develop links between Ukrainian and Finnish economists, and will give Ukrainian students access to up-to-date knowledge on specific issues relevant to modern economics.
